invalid_policy_names: Editing the assigned user for priority 1 incident ticket is not allowed unless there is no user assigned to the incident ticket
Serial numbers cannot be modified once asset is marked as 'In Use'
Inactive users cannot be assigned as managers of active users
Assets cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 5 active assets
Incidents with priority 1 cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 3 priority 1 incidents
